html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2019-11092019-07-21,  ,  ,  PMO, 
ActPublic Service Rearrangement and Transfer of Duties Act
SubjectTransfer of Duties Order
PrecisOrder transferring (1) from the Department of Crown-Indigenous Relations and Northern Affairs (CIRNAC) to the Department of Indigenous Services (ISC) the control and supervision of certain portions of the federal public administration in the Department of CIRNAC; (2) from the Minister of CIRNAC to the Minister of ISC, the powers, duties and functions of the Minister of CIRNAC that relate to the National Indigenous Economic Development Board; and (3) from the Department of ISC to the Department of CIRNAC the control and supervision of the portion of the federal public administration in the Department of ISC known as the Human Resources Planning, Performance Measurement and Systems Unit; effective July 22, 2019.
AttachmentsAttachment
act: Public Service Rearrangement and Transfer of Duties Act
subject: Transfer of Duties Order
precis: Order transferring (1) from the Department of Crown-Indigenous Relations and Northern Affairs (CIRNAC) to the Department of Indigenous Services (ISC) the control and supervision of certain portions of the federal public administration in the Department of CIRNAC; (2) from the Minister of CIRNAC to the Minister of ISC, the powers, duties and functions of the Minister of CIRNAC that relate to the National Indigenous Economic Development Board; and (3) from the Department of ISC to the Department of CIRNAC the control and supervision of the portion of the federal public administration in the Department of ISC known as the Human Resources Planning, Performance Measurement and Systems Unit; effective July 22, 2019.
